info.text: Given a set of statistical parameters, this model estimates hourly pedestrian travel using a negative binomial model estimated from hourly counts.  Provide the required statistical parameters to execute the model.
info.name: Pedestrian Volume (Binomial Method, Minnesota)

links.title: Understanding the Use of Non-Motorized Transportation Facilities (Report)

input.description: The indicated properties should be provided for each row of input data.  Omitting a property will result in an incomplete execution of the model as the missing property and its coefficients will be omitted from the model entirely.

elements.name: Pctnonwhite
elements.description: Percentage of neighborhood residents that are non-white

elements.name: PctU5_O65
elements.description: Percentage of neighborhood residents over 65 or under 5

elements.name: Pctw4ormore
elements.description: Percentage of neighborhood residents with a college education

elements.name: MedHHInc
elements.description: Median household income

elements.name: Crime
elements.description: Average number of violent crimes/year

elements.name: PDperkm2
elements.description: Population density in persons per square kilometer

elements.name: LUMix
elements.description: Measure of mixing of land uses (range 0-1)

elements.name: WatDist_km
elements.description: Distance from nearest body of water, in kilometers

elements.name: CBDdist_km
elements.description: Distance from central business district, kilometers

elements.name: EmployAccess
elements.description: Number of jobs accessible via transit.

elements.name: Tmax
elements.description: Recorded daily high temperature

elements.name: Precip
elements.description: Recorded precipitation

elements.name: University
elements.description: University district (1/0)

elements.name: BusRoute
elements.description: Presence of one of more bus routes (1/0)

elements.name: Principal
elements.description: Principal arterial street (1/0)

elements.name: Arterial
elements.description: Arterial street (1/0)

elements.name: Collector
elements.description: Collector street  (1/0)

elements.name: Local
elements.description: Local street (1/0)

elements.name: OnstreetFacility
elements.description: On street bicycle facility (1/0)

elements.name: OffstreetTrail
elements.description: Off-street trail (1/0)

elements.name: Year
elements.description: Level variable indicating year count occurred (offset from year 2007)

input.name: data
input.label: Analysis Input

input.description: These are the estimated coefficients for the Negative Binomial Pedestrian hourly volume model. They are presented for reference only and should not be changed without a full model re-estimation.

elements.name: constant
elements.description: Constant value

elements.name: Pctnonwhite_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS Pctnonwhite property

elements.name: PctU5_O65_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS PctU5_O65 property

elements.name: Pctw4ormore_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS Pctw4ormore property

elements.name: LUMix_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS LUMix property

elements.name: CBDdist_km_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS CBDdist_km property

elements.name: EmployAccess_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS EmployAccess property

elements.name: Tmax_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS Tmax property

elements.name: Precip_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS Precip property

elements.name: University_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS University property

elements.name: BusRoute_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS BusRoute property

elements.name: Principal_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS Principal property

elements.name: Arterial_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS Arterial property

elements.name: Collector_coeff
elements.description: Coefficient used for OLS Collector property

input.name: coefficients
input.label: Coefficients
